languages.text: "Твои слова о прошлом потонули в грязных оттенках чахлой зелени, а речи о настоящем опадают сизым пеплом на плечи слушателей. Скорбь... поистине тяготит тебя, Иеронимус. И от того огонь речей твоих лишен золотого сияния — от тусклых всполохов заветов на душе остается лишь черная копоть".

traits.locale_text: "Твои слова о прошлом потонули в грязных оттенках чахлой зелени, а речи о настоящем опадают сизым пеплом на плечи слушателей. Скорбь... поистине тяготит тебя, Иеронимус. И от того огонь речей твоих лишен золотого сияния — от тусклых всполохов твоих заветов на душе остается лишь черная копоть".

languages.text: "Your words about the past are drowned in murky hues of sickly green, and your talk of the present falls in grey flakes of ash upon the shoulders of your listeners. Sorrow... truly weighs heavily on you, Reverend Hieronymus. And that is why the fire in your words is devoid of golden radiance — the faded flickers of teachings leave nothing but black soot on their souls."
languages.original_text: "Твои слова о прошлом потонули в грязных оттенках чахлой зелени, а речи о настоящем опадают сизым пеплом на плечи слушателей. Скорбь... поистине тяготит тебя, Иеронимус. И от того огонь речей твоих лишен золотого сияния — от тусклых всполохов заветов на душе остается лишь черная копоть".

Sorrow... truly weighs heavily on you, Hieronymus. And that is why the fire in your words is devoid of golden radiance — the faded flickers of your teachings leave nothing but black soot in their souls."

Sorrow... truly weighs heavily on you, Reverend Hieronymus. And that is why the fire in your words is devoid of golden radiance — the faded flickers of teachings leave nothing but black soot on their souls."

languages.text: “你关于过去的话语，被淹没在病态、阴暗的绿色之中，而你关于现在的话语，则像是苍白的灰烬一样，落在听众们的肩上。悲伤……确实沉重地压在你的肩上，希罗尼穆斯牧师。这就是为什么你的话语中并没有金色的光芒。那些已经褪色的教义闪烁着，只会在灵魂中留下黑色的烟尘。”
languages.original_text: "Your words about the past are drowned in murky hues of sickly green, and your talk of the present falls in grey flakes of ash upon the shoulders of your listeners. Sorrow... truly weighs heavily on you, Reverend Hieronymus. And that is why the fire in your words is devoid of golden radiance — the faded flickers of teachings leave nothing but black soot on their souls."

traits.locale_text: “你关于过去的话语，被淹没在病态、阴暗的绿色之中，而你关于现在的话语，则像是苍白的灰烬一样，落在听众们的肩上。悲伤……确实沉重地压在你的肩上，希罗尼穆斯牧师。这就是为什么你的话语中并没有金色的光芒。那些已经褪色的教义闪烁着，只会在灵魂中留下黑色的烟尘。”

languages.text: «Sus palabras sobre el pasado se diluyen en un verde enfermizo, y sus palabras sobre el presente sucumben entre polvo gris de ceniza sobre los hombros de tus oyentes. La tristeza... es evidente que hace mella en usted, reverendo Hieronymus. Es por eso que el fuego de sus palabras está falto de esplendor; los titileos apagados de las enseñanzas no dejan más que hollín negro en sus almas».
languages.original_text: "Your words about the past are drowned in murky hues of sickly green, and your talk of the present falls in grey flakes of ash upon the shoulders of your listeners. Sorrow... truly weighs heavily on you, Reverend Hieronymus. And that is why the fire in your words is devoid of golden radiance — the faded flickers of teachings leave nothing but black soot on their souls."

traits.locale_text: «Sus palabras sobre el pasado se diluyen en un verde enfermizo, y sus palabras sobre el presente sucumben entre polvo gris de ceniza sobre los hombros de tus oyentes. La tristeza... es evidente que hace mella en usted, reverendo Hieronymus. Es por eso que el fuego de sus palabras está falto de esplendor; los titileos apagados de las enseñanzas no dejan más que hollín negro en sus almas».

languages.text: 「過去について語るあなたの言葉は病的な緑色の濁った色調に覆われていて、現在について語る言葉は灰の薄片となり、聞き手の肩に降り注いでいます。悲しみが…あなたに重くのしかかっているようですね、ヒエロニムス司祭。だからこそ、あなたの言葉の炎には黄金の煌めきが欠けているのです。色あせた教えの灯火は、人々の魂に黒い煤を残しています」
languages.original_text: "Your words about the past are drowned in murky hues of sickly green, and your talk of the present falls in grey flakes of ash upon the shoulders of your listeners. Sorrow... truly weighs heavily on you, Reverend Hieronymus. And that is why the fire in your words is devoid of golden radiance — the faded flickers of teachings leave nothing but black soot on their souls."

traits.locale_text: 「過去について語るあなたの言葉は病的な緑色の濁った色調に覆われていて、現在について語る言葉は灰の薄片となり、聞き手の肩に降り注いでいます。悲しみが…あなたに重くのしかかっているようですね、ヒエロニムス司祭。だからこそ、あなたの言葉の炎には黄金の煌めきが欠けているのです。色あせた教えの灯火は、人々の魂に黒い煤を残しています」

languages.text: "Eure Worte über die Vergangenheit ertrinken in einer trüben, kränklich grünen Flüssigkeit, und Eure Auslassungen über die Gegenwart fallen wie graue Ascheflocken auf die Schultern Eurer Zuhörerschaft. Auf Euch liegt wahrlich ... schwere Traurigkeit, Reverend Hieronymus. Und darum fehlt dem Feuer in Euren Worten jegliches goldene Strahlen – das verblasste Flackern Eurer Lehren hinterlässt auf den Seelen nur schwarzen Ruß."
languages.original_text: "Your words about the past are drowned in murky hues of sickly green, and your talk of the present falls in grey flakes of ash upon the shoulders of your listeners. Sorrow... truly weighs heavily on you, Reverend Hieronymus. And that is why the fire in your words is devoid of golden radiance — the faded flickers of teachings leave nothing but black soot on their souls."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Worte über die Vergangenheit ertrinken in einer trüben, kränklich grünen Flüssigkeit, und Eure Auslassungen über die Gegenwart fallen wie graue Ascheflocken auf die Schultern Eurer Zuhörerschaft. Auf Euch liegt wahrlich ... schwere Traurigkeit, Reverend Hieronymus. Und darum fehlt dem Feuer in Euren Worten jegliches goldene Strahlen – das verblasste Flackern Eurer Lehren hinterlässt auf den Seelen nur schwarzen Ruß."

languages.text: « Vos paroles sur le passé se perdent dans des teintes troubles d'un vert maladif, et votre discours sur le présent retombe comme des flocons de cendre grise sur les épaules de ceux qui vous écoutent. Le chagrin... pèse lourd sur vos épaules, révérend Hiéronymus. Et c'est pour ça que les flammes de vos propos n'émettent aucune lumière dorée. Les éclats vacillants de vos enseignements ne laissent rien d'autre qu'une suie noire sur les âmes. »
languages.original_text: "Your words about the past are drowned in murky hues of sickly green, and your talk of the present falls in grey flakes of ash upon the shoulders of your listeners. Sorrow... truly weighs heavily on you, Reverend Hieronymus. And that is why the fire in your words is devoid of golden radiance — the faded flickers of teachings leave nothing but black soot on their souls."

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles sur le passé se perdent dans des teintes troubles d'un vert maladif, et votre discours sur le présent retombe comme des flocons de cendre grise sur les épaules de ceux qui vous écoutent. Le chagrin... pèse lourd sur vos épaules, révérend Hiéronymus. Et c'est pour ça que les flammes de vos propos n'émettent aucune lumière dorée. Les éclats vacillants de vos enseignements ne laissent rien d'autre qu'une suie noire sur les âmes. »

languages.text: "Geçmişe dair sözlerin hastalıklı bir yeşilin bulanık tonlarına boğulmuş, bugüne dair söylediklerinse dinleyenlerin omuzlarına gri kül taneleri serpiyor. Hüzün sahiden de üstüne ağır bir yük gibi çökmüş Muhterem Hieronymus. Bu yüzden de sözcüklerindeki ateş, altın pırıltılardan yoksun. Öğretilerinin soluk titreşimleri, ruhlarda kara bir isten başka şey bırakmıyor."
languages.original_text: "Your words about the past are drowned in murky hues of sickly green, and your talk of the present falls in grey flakes of ash upon the shoulders of your listeners. Sorrow... truly weighs heavily on you, Reverend Hieronymus. And that is why the fire in your words is devoid of golden radiance — the faded flickers of teachings leave nothing but black soot on their souls."

traits.locale_text: "Geçmişe dair sözlerin hastalıklı bir yeşilin bulanık tonlarına boğulmuş ve bugüne dair söylediklerin, dinleyenlerin omuzlarına gri kül taneleri serpiyor. Üzüntü, üzerine gerçekten büyük bir ağırlık yapıyor Muhterem Hieronymus ve bu yüzden de sözcüklerindeki ateş, altın bir pırıltıdan yoksun. Öğretilerinin solgun titreşimleri, ruhlarda siyah bir isten başka bir şey bırakmıyor."
